a.title: Heather Wellington, Social Studies Teacher is the Foster-Glocester Regional School District 2019 Teacher of The Year

div.a: Heather Wellington, Social Studies Teacher is the Foster-Glocester Regional School District 2019 Teacher of The Year

div.p: I have been associated with Foster-Glocester Schools for more than 25 years as a teacher and administrator. There is something special about these communities, their smallness, and the lifestyle that results from the rural nature of these towns. Our schools are actively working toprovide your children with high-quality academic education, state-of-the-art facilities, and rigorous college and career pathways designed to develop the "whole"child and provide themwith a competitive edge.

div.div: 91 Anan Wade Road, North Scituate, RI 02857

div.p: Foster-Glocester Regional School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district's activities and programs. Foster-Glocester Regional School District also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
